d.DBDAO

Class CouponDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • d.DBDAO.CouponDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponDAO

    public class CouponDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponDAO

    implementation of CouponDAO which enable to contact with the CouponDB database easily and safely.

    All connections to the database are given by the ConnectionPool, and then returned to it. No opening or closing of connections are made here.
